item.title: üß¨ The new study looks at the BRCA2 protein, which is essential for repairing DNA lesions. Mutations in the BRCA2 gene, which produces the BRCA2 protein, can result in the protein not functioning properly and can lead to an increased risk of developing breast & ovarian cancer.2/7
item.description: üß¨ The new study looks at the BRCA2 protein, which is essential for repairing DNA lesions. Mutations in the BRCA2 gene, which produces the BRCA2 protein, can result in the protein not functioning properly and can lead to an increased risk of developing breast & ovarian cancer.2/7
item.content:encoded: üß¨ The new study looks at the BRCA2 protein, which is essential for repairing DNA lesions. Mutations in the BRCA2 gene, which produces the BRCA2 protein, can result in the protein not functioning properly and can lead to an increased risk of developing breast & ovarian cancer.2/7

item.title: ‚ùì BRCA2 must act in the right place & right time to repair DNA, so understanding its behavior is important for understanding its function. BRCA2 accumulates at sites of DNA damage, but it was unclear how the proteins moved & organized themselves at these sites when needed.3/7
item.description: ‚ùì BRCA2 must act in the right place & right time to repair DNA, so understanding its behavior is important for understanding its function. BRCA2 accumulates at sites of DNA damage, but it was unclear how the proteins moved & organized themselves at these sites when needed.3/7
item.content:encoded: ‚ùì BRCA2 must act in the right place & right time to repair DNA, so understanding its behavior is important for understanding its function. BRCA2 accumulates at sites of DNA damage, but it was unclear how the proteins moved & organized themselves at these sites when needed.3/7

item.content:encoded: @PCI_RegReports It provides a blueprint for how you can use @PCI_RegReports as a vehicle for getting a programme of work that will lead to multiple outputs (as RRs) peer-reviewed & accepted in advance through a single integrated review process. It includes two key features:

item.title:
The first is *scheduled review*, where the review process is planned in advance & the recommender lines up your reviewers while you're writing the Stage 1 manuscript https://t.co/DKLjZSgkP8
It's a big time saver, reducing Stage 1 review time enormously w/o compromising quality
